mdRecord.dcterms:title: Family Correspondence and Personal Letter Sent from Camp Davis Ford
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Family correspondence, personal letter dated June 17, 1861, to "My Dear Ellen," sent from Camp Davis Ford near Manassas Junction, from C. M. Stigleman, 1 original piece and 2 photocopied pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
